page.title: 13CHURCH AND CHAPEL IN BEMPTON
page.content: As with most modern communities, religion does not take a high priority with most people. In spite of this, both St. Michael's Church (C of E) and the Methodist Chapel have regular congregations. The vicar, the Rev. Hirst, is also the vicar of Flamborough and the Methodist minister, the Rev. Lewis, is also in charge of a much larger area than just our parish. The first Confirmation Service for over ten years was held at St. Michael's during May of this year when thirteen people joined full membership of the Church. In November of last year a church choir was brought into being by the assistant curate the Rev. Artley. The Methodist Chapel has a Sunday School with around six pupils.
